thread.title: Srinu Vaitla reveals more about Chiru's cameo in Bruce Lee
thread.title_full: Srinu Vaitla reveals more about Chiru's cameo in Bruce Lee - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Srinu Vaitla reveals more about Chiru's cameo in Bruce Lee
text: Chiranjeevi will be doing a cameo in Ram Charan's upcoming film, Bruce Lee. Speaking about the same, director Srinu Vaitla revealed that his team had planned to rope in the mega star right from the beginning of the project. Adding further, the ace director also said that Chiru's cameo will be a huge surprise for his fans and will entertain them big time with new moves. Rakul Preet is playing the female lead in the film which is being produced by DVV Danayya. SS Thaman is the music director. Audio of the film will be launched on the 2nd of October and the film is set for a release on the 16th of the same month.
